data.eml:eml: Genera of the Asian Catfish Families Sisoridae and Erethistidae (Teleostei: Siluriformes).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alfred W. Thomson, Lawrence M. Page (2006): Genera of the Asian Catfish Families Sisoridae and Erethistidae (Teleostei: Siluriformes). Zootaxa 1345: 1-96, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:25EFA792-7DA4-4E0D-A69A-12591B8422DE
